document_data.name: Terivelle Vaerovree
document_data.mainbody: '''Terivelle Vaerovree''' was the older sister of [[Talatha Vaerovree]].
document_data.History: She went missing hours before the pirate raid where her younger sister, [[Talatha Vaerovree]], was taken. By {{yearlink|1370}}, her sister knew not what had been of her fate.
